pr_title: DBZ-2021 Updates to allow downstream UG to build

timeline.message: DBZ-2021 Updates to allow downstream UG to build: link updates, anchor ID changes

timeline.bodyText:
The use of avro.adoc#names is quite plentiful across upstream docs.  Can you please update the references?  From what I can tell there are references in:

mongodb.adoc
mongodb-event-flattening.adoc
cassandra.adoc
db2.adoc
oracle.adoc
postgresql.adoc (this you already included)
sqlserver.adoc
timeline.author: Naros

replies.bodyText: Ahhh. of course! I'm on it.
replies.author: TovaCohen

timeline.message: DBZ-2021 Updates the other instances of links to Avro naming
